ci_support_linux_64_c_compiler_version10:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '10'
cdt_name:
- cos7
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cuda_compiler:
- nvcc
cuda_compiler_version:
- '11.2'
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '10'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cuda:11.2
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
  - cuda_compiler
  - cuda_compiler_version
  - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.description:
This is a plugin for OpenMM that allows neural networks to
access force and energy. It is implemented with PyTorch.
about.summary: OpenMM plugin to get forces for neural networks

about.description:
This is a plugin for OpenMM that allows neural networks to
access force and energy. It is implemented with PyTorch.
about.summary: OpenMM plugin to get forces for neural networks

name: openmmtorchplugin
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "openmmtorchplugin" %}
{% set version = "1.1.8" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/SCMusson/openmmtorchplugin/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  #sha256: 1d014dfc02ad0e424db2354f7e3c2a7d1e0a491e6bcdadbcc0d1ca058f60ed23

build:
  number: 3
  skip: true  # [cuda_compiler_version in (undefined, "None", "10.2", "11.0", "11.1")]
  skip: true  # [not unix]
  rpaths:
    - lib/
    - lib/plugins/
  #  - {{ SP_DIR }}/torch/lib
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage(name) }}

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('cuda') }}  # [cuda_compiler_version not in (undefined, 'None')]
    - make
    - cmake
    - swig

  host:
    - openmm
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools

  run:
    # openmm package is missing a run_export as of 9 June 2022
    - {{ pin_compatible('openmm', min_pin='x.x', max_pin='x.x') }}
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - torchexposedintegratorplugin
#  commands:
#    - test -f $PREFIX/include/TorchIntegratorKernels.h  # [unix]
about:
  home: https://github.com/SCMusson/openmmtorchplugin
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: OpenMM plugin to get forces for neural networks
  description: |
    This is a plugin for OpenMM that allows neural networks to 
    access force and energy. It is implemented with PyTorch.
  doc_url: https://github.com/SCMusson/openmmtorchplugin
  dev_url: https://github.com/SCMusson/openmmtorchplugin

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - SCMusson
    - degiacom
